name: TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to starting on site.
○ Survey conducted of all surfaces and the exterior of buldings on or adjacent to the boundaries of the site and of other property that might potentially be affected by the works.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Survey documents submitted to Engineer.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: FNDC Approved Materials List - Water Services
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Visual check for approved materials, quality and condition.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On arrival to site, prior to using materials.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Materials meet specifications or otherwise approved by Engineer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to commencing each stage of work.
○ Engineer to be notified if any concerns
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Survey set out as per IFC drawings.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Locate underground services within work area.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Locate, pothole and protect existing services. Pothole information shall be used to confirm fittings required to connect to the existing services.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: GAP20 grading curve to be submitted to Engineer for approval
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to using bedding material on site.
○ PE bedding, pipe surround and haunching shall be GAP20 in accordance with AS/NZS 2566.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Bedding grading curve accepted by Engineer.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Subbase material meets FNDC Engineering Standards
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to using subbase material on site.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Subbase material test certificates accepted by Engineer.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Basecourse material meets FNDC Engineering Standards
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to using basecourse material on site.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Basecourse material test certificates accepted by Engineer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Visual inspection prior to use (clean and free from defects).
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Three butt welded joints and one section of virgin pipe shall be tested in accordance with ISO 13953.
○ One test weld for every 10 lengths of pipe laid.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Weld test results submitted to Engineer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of each butt weld.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Weld inspection checklist submitted for each butt weld.
○ Weld data log submitted for each weld.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of each EF weld.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Weld inspection checklist submitted for each EF weld.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: Water Specification B.6.4.5 and B.6.4.6
○ Pipeline installed to correct alignment, grade and level
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of installation of each length of pipe, prior to backfilling.
○ Valves on centreline of pipe permissible vertical deviation of +50mm.
○ Changes to horizontal or vertical alignment to be agreed with Engineer pror
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: Water Specification B.5.8.4 and B.5.9
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Installed as per specifications.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: FNDC Engineering Standards 6.2.8.5, and Sheet 48
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of installation.
○ Valve marker posts and kerb markings as per FNDC standard.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Installed as per specificationsand IFC drawings.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: FNDC Engineering Standards 6.2.9.3, and Sheet 48
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of installation.
○ Hydrant marker posts and kerb markings as per FNDC standard.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of installation.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: FNDC Engineering Standards 6.2.3.8, and Sheet 50
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of the thrust block installation, prior to backfilling.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Bedding installed as per specifications.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of backfill.
○ Trench backfilled with original sound material from the trench.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : NDM testing on completion of subbase layer, prior to installing basecourse.
○ Backfill and compaction completed as per specifications.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : NDM testing on completion of basecourse layer, prior to sealing.
○ Basecourse installed as per FNDC Engineering Standards, and NZTA B/02.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Visual inspection and electrical continuity testing
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of installation.
○ A blue metallic detection tape labelled 'Water' shall be laid directly above all new non-metallic watermains.
○ Tracer cable (2.5mm²) shall be attached to pipe wall at maximum 3.0m intervals.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Electrical continuity test results provided to Engineer.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Pressure test of PE pipeline
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of installation of PE pipeline, after sufficent backfill has been placed to prevent movement.
○ Pressure test as per FNDC Engineering Standard.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Test results submitted to Engineer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of pressure test, prior to connection.
○ Flushing and chlorination/testing completed as per specifications. Results meet FNDC specification.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Test results provided to Engineer for approval prior to connection.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Connection to be completed after instruction from Engineer.
○ Note from FNDC Engineering Standard - "Only the FNDC's Reticulation Maintenance Contractor may undertake the connection".
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: FNDC Engineering Standards 6.3.2.2 and Sheet 46
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Connection to be completed after instruction from Engineer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of wastewater installation.
○ Driveways reinstated in the same material and to the same standard as existing prior to works.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of wastewater installation.
○ Footpaths reinstated in the same material and dimensions but constructed to FNDC Footpath Standards.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Replacement kerb and channel profiles match line and level of existing kerb and channel.
Concrete Pour (Stuctural - Pipe Bridge Footings, Commercial Driveways)
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to pouring concrete.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: FNDC Engineering Standards Sheets 12, 17 and 18
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to pouring concrete.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: As per NZTA M10 Specification
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of the pavement surface.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Test results submitted to Engineer.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: Water Supply Drawings Notes, No. 20.1 and 20.2
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Redundant watermains to be grout filled and remain in place.
○ Remove redundant valve boxes, signs etc.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Grout filling on completion of new pipelines.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: As-built drawings meet FNDC specification
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Draft as-builts shall be complete and accepted by Engineer prior to Practical Completion.
○ Final as-builts issued prior to Final Completion.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As-buiilts submitted to the Engineer for approval.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : RAMM information submitted to the Engineer on completion of works.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: RAMM information submitted to the Engineer.
